title: PBE Bugs
body:
I found Two Bugs on Pbe in one game as Aurellion Sol.

Sometimes, Aurellion can be targeted by towers in areas where he normally couldn't
This happened during my e, and i was shot by the tower when out of its range.

Also
Abyssal Scepter's Effect Icon
It's completely Blue

Please Fix Riot :)

replies.body:
Hey Farmcow0139!

For PBE pugs, please use the [PBE Report A Bug Feature](http://pbr.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/). ^-^ It helps us better track issues on live versus PBE.
